beta.note: high value implies that households are very patient

rho.note: determines how persistent temporary shocsk to technology are

torn.note: governs the curvature of flow utility with respect to leisure

v.note: governs the curvature of utility with respect to real balances

phi.note: low values of \(\phi\) imply low degrees of nominal rigidity

rhom.note: determines how persistent temporary shocsk to money supply are

nstar.note: pins down the steady state of the model
